alert.note: Alert for Sawtooth, Stanley Basin; Sun Valley Region; Wood River Foothills (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 08 at 12:18PM MST until January 10 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM TUESDAY TO 11 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches, except 10 to 24 inches on ridge tops and elevations above passes. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Sawtooth/Stanley Basin-Sun Valley Region-Wood River Foothills- Including the cities of Stanley, Ketchum, Sun Valley, Galena, Hailey, Bellevue, and Picabo. * WHEN...From 5 AM Tuesday to 11 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Sawtooth, Stanley Basin; Sun Valley Region; Wood River Foothills
